package.name: Meteor
package.long:
Advanced weather quark by Oleg Linkin for the SB2 panel providing a weather forecast for a given location.

Meteor also shows various additional information, like forecasted wind speed, humidity or sunrise and sunset times.

All the parameters are configurable, for example:
  • Update frequency.
  • Number of days to fetch weather for.
  • Measurement units for pressure, temperature and so on.
